TopicSection.Name: BodyText
TopicSection.Content:
The sorting feature allows the user to sort rows based on column values or expressions. Sorting can be set programmatically or manually at run-time by clicking column headers under grid layout engine.

Sample Code

Use the allowSorting option in the grid layout engine to enable run time sorting.

Javascript JS { allowSorting: true | false}

You can perform sorting by clicking on the column header. If the column has no initial sorting, the the sorting order will be ascending->descending->none.

You can also specify multiple sort keys (sort by a specified column or row first, then another column or row, and so on).

Sample Code

This example shows multiple sorting.

Javascript JS grid.data.sortDescriptions = [{field: 'salesDate', ascending: true},
                              {field: 'amount', ascending: false}]
